co.freeside.betamax.util
[Groovy] Class ProxyOverrider

java.lang.Object
  co.freeside.betamax.util.ProxyOverrider

class ProxyOverrider

Provides a mechanism to temporarily override current HTTP and HTTPS proxy settings and restore them later.

Method Summary
void activate(java.lang.String host, int port, java.util.Collection nonProxyHosts)

Activates a proxy override for the given URI scheme.
void deactivateAll()

Deactivates all proxy overrides restoring the pre-existing proxy settings if any.
java.net.ProxySelector getOriginalProxySelector()

Used by the Betamax proxy so that it can use pre-existing proxy settings when forwarding requests that do not match anything on tape.

getOriginalProxySelector

java.net.ProxySelector getOriginalProxySelector()
Used by the Betamax proxy so that it can use pre-existing proxy settings when forwarding requests that do not match anything on tape.
Returns:
a proxy selector that uses the overridden proxy settings if any.
